FAQ

Questions? Look here.

Can’t find an answer? Call us at 844 242 9464 or email info@qleen.com
Book Online
What’s included in your office cleaning service?

All you have to do is click on the Book Now button, enter your relevant details (name, address, phone number, your home size, and any extras you require). We’ll reply on the same business day confirming the appointment and arrival time. You can also call us for live help or chat with us.
